---
title: "Le Havre, France"
---

A great location to attack the English.

```{r out.width='100%', echo=FALSE}
egliseSaintJoseph <- paste("<b>Église Saint-Joseph</b>")
honfleur <- paste("<b>Honfleur</b>")
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
  setView(0.131177, 49.495933, zoom = 17) %>%
  addMarkers(0.101227, 49.490947, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = egliseSaintJoseph) %>% # Église Saint-Joseph
  addMarkers(0.232710, 49.421973, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = honfleur) # Honfleur
```

The Abbey, dating from the 8th century, has served as a prison and fortress in its history. Lying in the middle of a vast littoral zone, the area around the island floods with the tides.

```{r echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
titles <- c("Length of Stay", "Transportation", "Major Sights", "Restaurant Recommendations")
values <- c("1 day", "Three hour drive from Mont-Saint-Michel", "Saint-Joseph's Church, Museum of Modern Art André Malraux", "N/A")
df <- data.frame(titles, values)
library(knitr)
kable(df, col.names = NULL)
```
